page.title: 16MINSTERLEY SHOW
page.content: The show is held each year for a day in August at Poulton Farm. There are classes for farm animals,especially cattle, sheep, pigs & horses. The horses are Welsh cobs, Shetland ponies & shires. There are competitions for vegetables of all kinds, flowers, honey, home made cakes & all kinds of art & craft.Minsterley School usually enter for the the children's events. There are stalls which sell candy floss, hamburghers & ice-cream. At night there is a fair.It is exciting & noisy & bright. there are bumper cars, slot machines, coconut shies & hobby horses. Lots of Minsterley people go to the show & you meet all your friends.
